official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act making unlawful the offer or receipt of consideration for the referral of patients, clients, or customers.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) and Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to make it a misdemeanor punishable by a fine or not more than $10,000 or imprisonment for not more than one year or both for any person to offer or receive consideration for the referral of patients, clients, or customers.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act making unlawful the offer or receipt of consideration for the referral of patients, clients, or customers.
